歡迎各位fm bb，有咩關於space嘅問題可以喺道問
year 2同老鬼都可以幫手答

Frequently Asked Questions: 

1.點DEFER學費? 
打封英文解釋信 
加埋offer letter+經濟困難證明文件+留位費收據既copy 
交份copy去space院校就得 
帶埋所有文件正本比人check 
之後返去等通知 
詳情可以打去space問 
by梵高的星夜 

2.咩係天書? 
係KEC十樓，有每年不同科升大學的數據，包括公開試成績，GPA，IELTS，interview問題 

3. SPACE最伏係邊幾科? 
沒有廢科，只有廢人 

4. 常用連結
https://learner.hkuspace.hku.hk/

交學費、add drop swap科、睇timetable、apply locker、download notes、交功課、reference letter、圖書館book 房、睇/買transcript、 withdraw from study全部經portal入到

港大附屬學院成績驕人 是你首選

1/3升讀三兩大
2/3升讀八大UGC



同學連SEM BREAK都不忘回校，手執書卷努力溫習，反映學術氣氛濃厚


關於killer......
唔少人都話space有killer，永遠榮譽太空人港英狗（戇鳩仔）咁講：


不過我自己咁睇，我覺得好多因素影響grade嘅，每個lecturer點都要派啲A+派啲B-，如果你嗰班多勁人，有對比之下你自然睇落差啲；相反你嗰班本身廢廢哋，而你水平又稍為高啲啲，assignment同present做得好啲，個A/A+自然袋袋平安。加埋出grade前每個lecturer比嘅grade都會微調，assignment A+final grade拉落A A-拉上A+都有，9分努力1分運氣，做好自己結果唔會太差嘅，唔對路咪add drop轉班囉。

唔好聽到人話某個lecturer教得好就狗衝（尤其中英文），入到去比成班英文啪啪聲嘅學霸堂堂屌打，出gdp嘅時候就欲哭無淚。某啲傳說中嘅killer無人reg，結果一個學霸都無，呢個就係你大顯身手嘅時候，多啲答問題問問題唔好怕醜，啲廢人一定笑鳩你多嘢講，你要記住平時分就係咁樣來，出gdp嗰陣你揸隻A佢揸隻B，睇下邊個笑到最後。同埋千祈唔好遲到同埋走堂，平時分執豆咁執，蘇州過後無艇搭，無咗呢10%話知你全部assignment A+ final grade都唔會上到A+。機會只係劉備勤力嘅人，做人做狗自己決定

*雖然最頂寫住「沒有廢科，只有廢人」，只係祖訓來架咋，EE(energy & environment)、AA(Art appreciation)、IPhil(Introduction to philosophy)呢三科係大伏，揀咗嘅自己睇路，drop科保平安

祝各位太空人早日返回地球



比啲掙扎！

I want you to 過三爆四

Dear Students,

Let me welcome you to the new academic year in a historic time.

As the new semester will commence in a few weeks on 17 September 2020, I would like to update you the class arrangement for the semester. While the global pandemic has brought about many challenges to learning due to suspension of in-person meetings, CC is well prepared to minimize disruption to student learning. As early as 2 years ago, CC undertook initiatives to revamp our curricular and assessment designs to align with the modern education approaches, incorporating effective use of learning technologies. Our migration onto online instruction last semester was by far very smooth and effective. Many students actually found certain features of online instruction such as the ability to revisit recorded lectures and spontaneous breakout chat sessions very useful and even superior to conventional learning.

We will continue to improve our preparation to ensure a meaningful learning experience for our students amidst the coronavirus outbreak. Training workshops are organised to prepare our teachers for the rapidly developing learning technology. By the end of this month, all of the 100+ classrooms in our various learning centres will be retrofitted with upgraded teaching stations, allowing students at remote sites to attend instructional activities in synchronous and effective manner. Some classrooms are being purposely converted into distant learning venues. All courses are revised to ensure effective delivery using multiple modes of instruction.

quote.msg:
Dear Students,

Let me welcome you to the new academic year in a historic time.

As the new semester will commence in a few weeks on 17 September 2020, I would like to update you the class arrangement for the semester. While the global pandemic has brought about many challenges to learning due to suspension of in-person meetings, CC is well prepared to minimize disruption to student learning. As early as 2 years ago, CC undertook initiatives to revamp our curricular and assessment designs to align with the modern education approaches, incorporating effective use of learning technologies. Our migration onto online instruction last semester was by far very smooth and effective. Many students actually found certain features of online instruction such as the ability to revisit recorded lectures and spontaneous breakout chat sessions very useful and even superior to conventional learning.

We will continue to improve our preparation to ensure a meaningful learning experience for our students amidst the coronavirus outbreak. Training workshops are organised to prepare our teachers for the rapidly developing learning technology. By the end of this month, all of the 100+ classrooms in our various learning centres will be retrofitted with upgraded teaching stations, allowing students at remote sites to attend instructional activities in synchronous and effective manner. Some classrooms are being purposely converted into distant learning venues. All courses are revised to ensure effective delivery using multiple modes of instruction.

replies.msg:
Given the current resurgence of Covid-19 cases, the College will commence the semester with online instruction for the first two weeks on 17-30 September. During this period, classes will be delivered at the time-tabled slots by synchronous instruction via Zoom. All the course materials, recorded lectures and Zoom meeting links will be posted on SOUL. The College will continue to monitor the COVID-19 situation and if situation permits, face-to-face classes will be resumed as far as practicable. The teaching arrangement onwards of 3 October will be announced on or before 4 September 2020.

We will continue to provide student counseling and advisory service online during the periods of in-person class suspension. College campuses will remain open with some adjustments to the opening hours. Please check regularly latest information posted by the College on the Learner Portal.

Please stay vigilant and take your health as the top priority! I look forward to meeting you in person!

Prof LS Chan
College Principal

ABA老鬼路過 （grad咗10幾年，UGC學位畢業）

Sharing:
1. 練好啲英文， 英文好喺太空喺可以打橫行 (especially present,寫essay...)

2. 如果公開試因為肥一兩科而冇full cert （I mean 符合jupas入U最低要求），最好考返full cert

3. 多啲識同學仔，雖然大家都係競爭者鬥攞高grade, 但識到一班啱channel嘅同路人，總好過孤軍作戰。

4. 努力讀書入大學雖然重要，但吊頸都要料下氣，所以不妨課餘參加一個你感興趣嘅society，放鬆下自己，又可以識到一班人。

4. 大學information day係必去。原因唔駛我講。

replies.msg:
我已經畢業10幾年，唔知呢幾年UGC學位收生數據係點? 你可以上10樓看天書 查下近年收生多唔多non full cert人士。 full cert喺我年代嚟講，都係一個小小紅利囉（小小咋，非決定性）。當大家都係咁上下GPA (asso成績）時，大學會其他方面表現例如公開試成績or其他表現（例如interview)。

Jupas收生通常只看公開試成績，但non jupas收生，除咗asso GPA, 仲睇好多方面包括DSE成績 課外活動表現等。

如果我係你 我或者會考慮報咗DSE中文先，聽講2021年中文少咗兩篇範文喎，又冇口試喎

報咗名 能抽到時間備試當然最好。但如果你到時覺得asso學業workload大，冇時間去備試，最多唔去考囉。(記住，asso GPA vs 中文合格，當然取GPA而捨中文合格！）

Good luck~

我已經畢業10幾年，唔知呢幾年UGC學位收生數據係點? 你可以上10樓看天書 查下近年收生多唔多non full cert人士。 full cert喺我年代嚟講，都係一個小小紅利囉（小小咋，非決定性）。當大家都係咁上下GPA (asso成績）時，大學會其他方面表現例如公開試成績or其他表現（例如interview)。

Jupas收生通常只看公開試成績，但non jupas收生，除咗asso GPA, 仲睇好多方面包括DSE成績 課外活動表現等。

如果我係你 我或者會考慮報咗DSE中文先，聽講2021年中文少咗兩篇範文喎，又冇口試喎

報咗名 能抽到時間備試當然最好。但如果你到時覺得asso學業workload大，冇時間去備試，最多唔去考囉。(記住，asso GPA vs 中文合格，當然取GPA而捨中文合格！）

Good luck~

Dear Students,

Given the improving public health situation in Hong Kong, the College will resume partial face-to-face (f2f) meetings starting from October 3. The f2f teaching arrangements of your courses will be announced by the specific course teachers nearer the time. However, all courses will still be available online throughout the whole semester and you have the option of completing the semester online. It is not mandatory for you to return to campus for f2f classes except for some courses requiring hands-on engagement.

All course assessment will remain the same irrespective of whether the course is delivered online or by mixed-mode. There will be no onsite final examination and all end-of-term assessment will take place online.

Health and safety of the College community is our priority. If you have coronavirus symptoms or feel unwell, please stay home and visit a doctor. Teachers will upload the lecture videos onto SOUL. For those who come to the campus, they need to:

1) Complete Health Declaration Form
2) Have temperature check
3) Wear face mask at all times
4) Maintain proper social distancing
5) Maintain good personal hygiene

Please also refer to the protocols posted on the Learner Portal for more details.

In the coming months, we may possibly face another wave of pandemic outbreak. The College will closely monitor the situation and make necessary adjustments. Be prepared to switch back to online delivery for all courses at short notice.

Please stay vigilant, and make your personal and other’s health your top priority.

Prof LS Chan
College Principal

However, all courses will still be available online throughout the whole semester and you have the option of completing the semester online. It is not mandatory for you to return to campus for f2f classes except for some courses requiring hands-on engagement.

All course assessment will remain the same irrespective of whether the course is delivered online or by mixed-mode. There will be no onsite final examination and all end-of-term assessment will take place online.

Health and safety of the College community is our priority. If you have coronavirus symptoms or feel unwell, please stay home and visit a doctor. Teachers will upload the lecture videos onto SOUL. For those who come to the campus, they need to:

1) Complete Health Declaration Form
2) Have temperature check
3) Wear face mask at all times
4) Maintain proper social distancing
5) Maintain good personal hygiene

Please also refer to the protocols posted on the Learner Portal for more details.

In the coming months, we may possibly face another wave of pandemic outbreak. The College will closely monitor the situation and make necessary adjustments. Be prepared to switch back to online delivery for all courses at short notice.

Please stay vigilant, and make your personal and other’s health your top priority.

Prof LS Chan
College Principal
